card.name: Snapcaster Mage
card.text: FlashWhen Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Thing in the Ice
card.text: DefenderThing in the Ice enters the battlefield with four ice counters on it.Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, remove an ice counter from Thing in the Ice. Then if it has no ice counters on it, transform it.

card.name: Awoken Horror
card.text: When this creature transforms into Awoken Horror, return all non-Horror creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Argivian Welcome
card.text: Destroy up to one target creature with power 4 or greater.Choose a nonland card in your hand. It perpetually gains flash.

card.name: Argothian Uprooting
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on each of up to X target lands you control. They each become 0/0 Elemental creatures with reach, haste, and "When this creature leaves the battlefield, conjure a card named Forest onto the battlefield tapped." They're still lands.

card.name: By Elspeth's Command
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one that wasn't chosen during your last combat â€”â€¢ Up to one target Soldier perpetually gets +1/+1 and gains flying.â€¢ Choose a Soldier card in your hand. It perpetually gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance.â€¢ Create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

card.name: Crucias, Titan of the Waves
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may discard a card. If you do, create a Treasure token and choose ambitious or expedient. If you chose ambitious, seek a card with greater mana value than the discarded card. If you chose expedient, seek a card with elsser mana value than the discarded card.

card.name: Fallaji Antiquarian
card.text: HasteWhen Fallaji Antiquarian enters the battlefield, conjure a duplicate of another target nontoken creature or artifact you control into your graveyard. The duplicate perpetually gains {1}{R}.

card.name: Forgefire Automaton
card.text: Prototype {2}{B} â€” 3/2At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card with power less than Forgefire Automaton's power from your graveyard to the battlefield. Its bas power perpetually becomes equal to Forgefire Automaton's power.

card.name: Foundry Groundbreaker
card.text: When Foundry Groundbreaker enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land. Then conjure two cards named Foundry Groundbreaker's onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Gixian Recycler
card.text: When Gixian Recycler dies or is put into your graveyard from your hand or library, conjure a card named Gixian Recycler into your graveyard.Unearth {1}{B}

card.name: Great Desert Hellion
card.text: Starting intensity 1MenaceAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Great Desert Hellion unless you discard a card. If you discard a card this weay, perpetually increase Great Desert Hellion's intensity by 1.When Great Desert Hellion leaves the battlefield, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to Great Desert Hellion's intensity.

card.name: Jarsyl, Dark Age Scion
card.text: Starting intensity 1At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may cast a spell with mana value equal to Jarsyl, Dark Age Scion's intensity from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If you do, perpetually increase Jarsyl's dintensity by 1.

card.name: Kayla's Kindling
card.text: When Kayla's Kindling enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.At the beginning of your upkeep, draft a card from Kayla's Kindling's spellbook and exile it. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

card.name: Lonely End
card.text: Choose one â€”â€¢ Target creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.â€¢ Remove three loyalty counters from target planeswalker.If you weren't the starting player, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Norn's Disassembly
card.text: {1}{W}, Sacrifice a historic permanent: Seek a historic card.

card.name: Penregon Besieged
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures your opponents control. It perpetually gets -1/-1.Whenever your opponents control no creatures, sacrifice Penregon Besieged.

card.name: Piece It Together
card.text: Starting intensity 1Draw a card. If Piece It Together's intensity is 4, instead take an extra turn after this one.Perpetually increase Piece It Together's intensity and the intensity of cards named Piece It Together in your graveyard, hand, and library by 1.

card.name: Raddic, Tal Zealot
card.text: Hexproof from white, hexproof from blackWhenever one or more Knights you control attack, draft a card from Raddic, Tal Zealot's spellbook.

card.name: Richlau, Headmaster
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}. When you do, target artifact card in your graveyard perpetually gains "This creature spell costs {1} less to cast." If it's a creature or Vehicle card, it perpetually gets +2/+2. Put it into your library second from the top.

card.name: Rusko, Clockmaker
card.text: When Rusko, Clockmaker enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Midnight Clock onto the battlefield.Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put an hour counter on each permanent you control named Midnight Clock. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sylvan Smite
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if you weren't the starting player. Then that player deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

card.name: Tawnos Endures
card.text: Exile target creature. It gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this card is exiled, it perpetually gets +1/+1, then you may put it onto the battlefield."

card.name: Tomakul Phoenix
card.text: Flying, hasteWhen Tomakul Phoenix dies, it perpetually gets +2/+2At the beginning {X}{R}, where X is Tomakul Phoenix's power. If you do, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Warzone Duplicator
card.text: Prototype {3}{U} â€” 3/3When Warzone Duplicator enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls with power less than Warzone Duplicator's power to its owner's hand. If that creature wasn't a token, conjure a duplicate of it into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend this mana as though it were many of any color to cast this card we wish we could read the end of, but it got previewed with a scrollbar on the text which is very cool."

card.name: Yotian Courier
card.text: FlyingWhenever Yotian Courier attacks, choose one that wasn't chosen during your last combat â€”â€¢ Create a tapped Powerstone token.â€¢ Seek an artifact card with mana value equal to the number of Powerstones you control.
